dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: I can lead you to the humble abode if you follow me.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Alright, alright, lead me to this wonderful place you keep speaking of.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: You're gonna get along with Grumpy.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Don't know, just a gut feeling.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Say that again and I'll find a mistletoe to tease you with-

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: Nope nope. I swear I will keep my mouth shut, I swear!

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: You better... cause I won't tell you if I do find one.

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: I signed up for hell didn't I?

dialogue.speaker: Partner
dialogue.line: By the way, if Grumpy scratches you, it's their way of showing affection.
